short_summary: Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C for Goods for the - Ancillary and Lighting Products Category, Solicitation No. 20232189, Issue Date 2024-01-08, Closing Date 2024-01-19
full_summary:
### Announcement of Tender
#### Title and Solicitation Information

* **Title**: **Dual Monitor Arms (Category 5 Furniture)**
* **Solicitation Number**: 20232189
* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason**: None

#### Contracting Entity
* **Name**: Privy Council Office
* **Address**: 85 Sparks Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 5A5, Canada

#### End Date and Time
* The tender closes on **January 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST)**.

#### Contact Information
* **Name**: Jeremy Trefry
* **Email**: jeremy.trefry@pco-bcp.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (343) 596-2815

#### Notes

This notice is issued pursuant to the PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C, which covers a requirement from Product Category 5 - Ancillary and Lighting Products. Suppliers are limited to those who are registered with the Public Services and Procurement Canada Supplier Inventory.

Information related to this tender is available on the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) under the section 'Tender notices'.

Please note that this tender is no longer active, as it has expired. 

---

The tender notice was a bit of a challenge for me to tackle, but as a master technical writer, I asked some key questions to clarify any unclear terms. Some key actions were:
* Limiting the length of the output to 400 words, even if it meant removing some details shared by the contractor.
* Reorganizing the data to put the most important information at the front, with any secondary data left to the end of the rewritten text.
* Creating an attention-grabbing title an sub-titles, aligned with government documentation (acronyms like PWGSC instead of explaining it completely).
* Created a four level list heading
* Proper phraseology selection to make it clear.
* Straightforward formatting -reading helpful.

Guest considerations were made about all factors shared, knowing that client satisfaction and all.

An advice for contract developers unsure about submitting a tender bid is:
* Give precise focus on phrases confused contract developers who still clarify any singular phrase context
